name: Ray Blackwell
text:
Ok place to work at safety is very important to the power company.
It's the backbone of the business.
Why would you want to work any place that you don't feel safe.
I've worked there many times before.. I'd love to have a regular job there with the APCO.
Great people and great opportunity to move forward with the company as well as getting home safely.

name: Trucking Inside
text: Slow. Been here in door for 2 hrs. Took 4 hrs from arrival time

name: Twin 1 Transport Inc.
text: Love this place. Room to park overnight
